attributes.action: For David Cameron To Resign As PM Due To The Lack Of Confidence The Public Have
attributes.background: For Lying over Syria, Tax Credits, Budget Cuts, Tax Haven, Bailouts, Immigration; Crushing the economy, health & social care, human & disability rights, education, employment, steel, housing, social security, pensions; For increasing taxation, homelessness, censorship, MP's salaries, and corruption.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the resignation of the Prime Minister or any other Minister is not the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.

We already have a petition open calling on the House of Commons to consider a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127053
